Html:
Hi Radioman. Thanks for a great tool!

When I center a Map over New Zealand it is cut off to the east. Please see a picture of what I mean here:

http://s602.photobucket.com/albums/tt105/aklahr/?action=view&current=map.jpg

If I center over Europe for example it works fine. It is the same with GoogleMap and YahooMap. I haven't tried any others.

I am using WPF and this is my Map configuration.

MainMap.MapType = MapType.YahooMap
        MainMap.MaxZoom = 17
        MainMap.MinZoom = 1
        MainMap.Zoom = 5
        MainMap.CurrentPosition = New PointLatLng(-40.913512576127573, 173.408203125)

 

Thanks
good point, i'll try to figure it out ;}

Thanks radioman, have you had a chance to look at this? Unfortunately our first prospect for our app using Gmap is in New Zealand.

Cheers
as you see, not so much ;/ but i will, maybe somebody interesting to solve this isue?
